attributes.action: say no to benefit handouts to turkey
attributes.additional_details:
Our government are being forced to open our benefit system to turkey,
As our country is on the fringe of another economic meltdown,
Us British are having to make sacrifices at all levels as it is. To add to this, the eu are proposing we open our welfare system to turkey!
If this is passed and agreed it will open the door to yet more immigration and more money in handouts coming out of British taxpayers pockets.
Also England will be open to other non eu countries having access to our welfare system should Brussels decide so,

Stop being victims of eu decisions, keep Britain from handing out taxpayer money hand over fist, put Britain first.
